job.title: Developer I - Software Engineering
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: Requirements Job Description Candidates must have at least 2-4 years of hands on experience with Python and Tcl programming. Needs to have advanced Unix/Linux programming skills. Excellent interpersonal and analytical skills with the ability to work independently Highly motivated, excellent team spirit, product and customer oriented Ideal candidate would have at least 1 year of hands on experience supporting Python SW development for CAD Tools or other HW applications for latest design, methodology, technology, algorithms and automation. Education Required - Bachelors of Science degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or similar field. Preferred – Masters of Science degree in Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, or similar field. Position will work from home until policy is lifted. Employee is expected to be onsite after July. This is a top priority position. Ideal candidate would have at least 2 years of hands on experience supporting Python SW development for CAD Tools or other HW applications for latest design, methodology, technology, algorithms and automation.
